name: ping (itch) (glassjoseph)
description:
Take classic pong for a spin with a mix of different gameplay modes.

Controls:

Action Button Player 1 movement: WASD Player 2 movement: Arrows Serve: Space Reset: Escape Pause: Q or P Mega ball: M or 1 Blinky ball: I or 2 Up close and personal: X or 3 Bouncy walls: B or 4 Free range: F or 5 Multi ball add ball: Y or 6 Multi ball remove ball: U or 7 Co-op: C or 8 Modes

Bouncy Walls - Try to hit the ball against your own side to score, but watch for the crazy ricochets.

Free Range - Unleash the incredible power of the left and right buttons.

Coop Mode - Two paddles, one team! Work together to score on the right side goal while defending against hits to your left side.

See if you can manage some of these tricks:

  • Supercharge a serve.
  • Get a 20-goal combo.
  • Get the ball stuck in a goal.
  • Get to -50 points.
  • Find which mid-game rapidfire mode toggling will most mess with your opponent or teammate!
